name: Relentless Focus
description: Focus your senses for 1 minute, increasing your Weapon and Spell Damage by 60 with every Light or Heavy Attack, up to 5 times.  While active, hitting an enemy with 5 Light or Heavy Attacks converts this ability into Assassin's Scourge, allowing you to fire a spectral arrow for half cost that deals 4321 Disease Damage, and heals for 33% of the damage dealt if you are within melee range.
effectLines: Converts into a Stamina ability and deals Disease Damage.  Increases duration.
coefDescription: Focus your senses for 1 minute, increasing your Weapon and Spell Damage by 60 with every Light or Heavy Attack, up to 5 times.  While active, hitting an enemy with 5 Light or Heavy Attacks converts this ability into Assassin's Scourge, allowing you to fire a spectral arrow for half cost that deals $1 Disease Damage, and heals for 33% of the damage dealt if you are within melee range.
